TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeExpressionCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供可代表一組程式碼文件物件模型 (CodeDOM) 的運算式物件的簡單集合物件。Provides a simple collection object that can represent a set of Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) expression objects. 類別提供可用來儲存一組 物件的簡單集合物件。The class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of objects. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別方法。The following example demonstrates the use of the class methods. 範例會建立類別的新執行個體，並使用方法來陳述式加入至集合，傳回其索引，新增或移除特定索引處的屬性。The example creates a new instance of the class and uses the methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove attributes at a specific index point.
